mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todo_list (date, content, is_mission, is_checked, link, user_id) VALUES (#{date}, #{content}, #{isMission}, #{isChecked}, #{link}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE todo_list SET content = CASE WHEN #{content} IS NOT NULL AND #{content} != '' THEN #{content} ELSE content END, link = CASE WHEN #{link} IS NOT NULL AND #{link} != '' THEN #{link} ELSE link END WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, date, content, is_mission As isMission, is_checked AS isChecked, link, user_id AS userId FROM todo_list WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND date = #{date}
